product_name: Edelrid Boa DuoTec Bi-Color 9.8mm x 60m Non-Dry Rope
long_description: Head to the crag for a day of sport or trad climbing with the Edelrid Boa DuoTec 9.8mm x 60m non-dry climbing rope. It's light enough for long approaches and has a supple feel for great handling. 9.8mm diameter and a weight of 62g per meter makes the Boa rope a great choice for climbs that require a long approach as well as sport cragging. Thermo Shield treatment consists of a heat process to stabilize individual yarns, ensuring the rope stays supple throughout its working lifetime. Setting up a rappel? You can see, at-a-glance, the middle of the rope thanks to the DuoTec distinct sheath pattern. This DuoTec bi-color marking is easily visible from a variety of angles and enhances rope management. Kernmantle design features a stretchy core protected by a durable outer sheath which combine for strength and good handling. The Edelrid Boa DuoTec 9.8mm x 60m non-dry climbing rope meets UIAA tests for falls, impact force and elongation.
short_description: Head to the crag for a day of sport or trad climbing with the Edelrid Boa DuoTec 9.8mm x 60m non-dry climbing rope. It's light enough for long approaches and has a supple feel for great handling.
